mediaChecklist.heading: Liste de contrôle
mediaChecklist.instructions: Voici quelques étapes communes pour la vérification collaborative. Complétez autant de tâches que vous le pouvez afin que nous ayons un dossier complet et transparent de notre enquête.
mediaChecklist.messageWho: Who’s the contact? Indicate information like @username and Email or Phone
mediaChecklist.messageWhat: What’s the issue? Clearly explain which facts are in question.
mediaChecklist.messageWhere: Where’s the location? Indicate specific city names and regions.
mediaChecklist.messageWhen: When did it happen? Include a timestamp with time zone, like 9/11/2016 HH:MM PM EST.
mediaChecklist.messageOriginal: Is this just a retweet? Indicate Is original or Is not original or Unsure.
mediaChecklist.messageDetails: Anything else? Indicate additional info including social media exchanges or interviews.
